description: protocol schema generate by tagSchemaToJson from protocol

batch_number.description: The batch number of the kit used.

core.description: Type and schema for this object.

description.description: A text-based description of the protocol.

id.description: A unique ID for this protocol.

pdf.description: The name of a PDF file containing the details of the protocol.

retail_name.description: The retail name of the kit used. e.g. TruSeq RNA Library Prep Kit v2.

type.description: Type of protocol. Ideally an EFO term.

title: protocol
